markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Knock](/Spells.aspx?ID=1581)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 340 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Alseta](/Deities.aspx?ID=329), [Barzahk](/Deities.aspx?ID=534), [Dranngvit](/Deities.aspx?ID=446), [Lao Shu Po](/Deities.aspx?ID=312), [The Deliberate Journey](/Deities.aspx?ID=250), [Urban Prosperity](/Deities.aspx?ID=256)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 door, lock, or container
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You make the target easier to open. _Knock_ grants a +4 status bonus to any creature that tries to open the target door, lock, or container with an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) or a [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) check. You can attempt a Thievery check to open the target as part of casting _knock_, and you add your level even if you're untrained.

 _Knock_ [counteracts](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) _lock_.
name: Knock

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 340 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Alseta](/Deities.aspx?ID=329), [Barzahk](/Deities.aspx?ID=534), [Dranngvit](/Deities.aspx?ID=446), [Lao Shu Po](/Deities.aspx?ID=312), [The Deliberate Journey](/Deities.aspx?ID=250), [Urban Prosperity](/Deities.aspx?ID=256)

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

 

**Target** 1 door, lock, or container
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Make a door, lock, or container easier to open, and possibly open it immediately.
</summary>
summary: Make a door, lock, or container easier to open, and possibly open it immediately.
summary_markdown: Make a door, lock, or container easier to open, and possibly open it immediately.
text: Knock Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 340 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Deities Alseta, Barzahk, Dranngvit, Lao Shu Po, The Deliberate Journey, Urban Prosperity Range 30 feet Target 1 door, lock, or container Duration 1 minute --- You make the target easier to open. Knock grants a +4 status bonus to any creature that tries to open the target door, lock, or container with an Athletics or a Thievery check. You can attempt a Thievery check to open the target as part of casting knock , and you add your level even if you're untrained. Knock counteracts lock .
